name: 陳雅玫
objective: This course intends to build up confidence and competence of students who are interested in reading news articles on a variety of topics. It will help students enrich their vocabulary by introducing key expressions in realms like politics, arts, entertainment, science & technology, sports, business and health. Additionally, diverse forms of activities are arranged to enable students to develop effective reading skills. This course is also designed to enhance students’ listening abilities through the use of video-audio materials from on-line news channels like ICRT, CNN, BBC and VOA.

2. in class exercises & quizzes: 35%

materials:
Teaching Materials:
1.Instructor’s handouts
2.news articles from on-line newspapers (e.g. the New York Times, the Washington Post, the Times, the Guardian, the Taipei Times and the China Post) or magazines (e.g. Newsweek, Time, The Economist, Scientific American and Businessweek).
3.video/audio clips from news channels like ICRT, CNN, BBC, VOA and CBS.
